PerformanceScriptTimingSourceURL.summary: NOTE Experimental The sourceURL read-only property of the interface returns a string representing the URL of the script.

remarks.para: It is important to note that the reported function location will be the "entry point" of the script, that is, the top level of the stack, not any specific slow sub-function. See for more discussion around this.

PerformanceScriptTimingSourceURL.value: A string. Returns an empty string if the URL was not found.
